definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItem" id="drop">drop</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:drop</field><value name="VAL"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CellPhone</field></block></value><next><block type="item_nbt_text_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">contact</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:drop</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">HelpCenter</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:drop</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:EarthXPhonePillagerDefeated</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
